body.p: For individuals, ANS/DA and cooperative enterprises etc. that are engaged in business activity without being obliged tosubmit annual accounts pursuant to the Accounting Act, but are subject to a bookkeeping duty pursuant to the Bookkeeping Act. Use of information provided in form RF-1175 by other public agencies In order to coordinate and simplify reporting by business and industry, information provided in this form can be used in whole or in part by other public agencies authorised to collect the same information, cf. the Act relating to the Register of Reporting Obligations of Enterprises sections 5 and 6. Information about any such coordination can be obtained from the Register of Reporting Obligations of Enterprises by calling +47 75 00 75 00, Sales revenues and withdrawals – liable to VAT
